title: Pound jumps as Barnier says Brexit deal 'possible'
text:
Woodford Investment Management Ltd Copyright: Woodford Investment Management Ltd

The name of the Woodford fund will change, to reflect the fact the fund is no longer by Neil Woodford, Link says.

"The name of the fund will, subject to the required regulatory process, be amended to reflect the fact that Woodford will no longer be the investment manager to the Fund.

"The name of the company, the umbrella fund of which the fund is a sub-fund, will also be amended.

"Consequently, as soon as practicable and once regulatory permission has been received, the name of the fund will change from “LF Woodford Equity Income Fund” to “LF Equity Income Fund”, and the name of the company will change from “LF Woodford Investment Fund” to “LF Investment Fund”.

"We will notify you when this change takes place".
description: Michel Barnier has said a Brexit deal is 'still possible this week'.
